info.name: Novilar Nightmode
info.description: A darker theme for Novilar. Only available in Alligator flavour, until further notice. -To report any issues please see the forum thread
info.additionalInfo:
2020 Changelog:
-Re-darkening the new pet backgrounds

2019 Changelog:
-Re-darkening the now smooth panel headers.

-Forum threads should now be evenly coloured (again)
-Blinding shop headers have once again been darkened
-Added text-shadow to make text visible against background images
-Sidebar should be easier to read

2018 Changelog:
-Small update to fix the white in forum threads and the navbar.
